summary: Provides a high‑level API for provisioning, tracking, and interacting with containerized test hosts. It defines data structures for container metadata, access details, and an in‑memory registry, and implements utilities for creating, starting, inspecting, and cleaning up Docker/Podman containers as well as managing SSH port forwarding for test sessions.
business_intent: Enable automated Ansible testing by dynamically launching isolated container environments, exposing necessary network and SSH interfaces, and handling their lifecycle so that test suites can run against realistic target hosts without manual setup.
